argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_snsspw | |- { A } C_ ~P A |
| 2 |  | #P_ssexg | |- ( ( { A } C_ ~P A /\ ~P A e. _V ) -> { A } e. _V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( ~P A e. _V -> { A } e. _V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_pwexg | |- ( A e. _V -> ~P A e. _V ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_con3i | |- ( -. ~P A e. _V -> -. A e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_snprc | |- ( -. A e. _V <-> { A } = (/) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpi | |- ( -. A e. _V -> { A } = (/) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_0ex | |- (/) e. _V |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( -. A e. _V -> { A } e. _V ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( -. ~P A e. _V -> { A } e. _V ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_pm2.61i | |- { A } e. _V |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ snex using Power Set ( ~ ax-pow ) instead of Pairing ( ~ ax-pr ).  Unlike in the proof of ~ zfpair , Replacement ( ~ ax-rep ) is not needed.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)  See also ~ snex . (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
